name: Stale Nation
description:
Will You Survive?
Can you navigate the zombie outbreak and find a way out of this nightmare? Stale Nation puts you in the shoes of Thomas, a young man who arrives back from spending months on a hiking trip to find that the world around him has been plunged into chaos. Infected now roam the world seeking nothing more than to infect all of those who are uninfected. Sneak by the infected, learn more about what happened, and escape in this stealth based, zombie adventure game created by a solo developer.



Features
  • Stealth mechanics that force you to think about how you move around the infected.
  • A deep, immersive story that is captivating and chilling.
  • A journal to keep track of things you have learned and read about.
  • Highly detailed level design with lots of material to immerse yourself into the story.
